name: Rocket Assembly
description:
collect all 7 rocket pieces then return to the launch pad to win!

Controls
  • wasd / left joystick - move
  • left click / left trigger - shoot
  • mouse / right joystick - aim
  • space / shoulder buttons - dash
  • right click / right trigger - explode bullets

follow the green and red dots to go to a rocket peice and the launch pad respectively
(the green dot is a bit broken though)

Credits

coding - Nettakrim
art - Walex
music - The Other Guy
